entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
